bibl.title: Women as Property Owners in Roman Egypt.
bibl.note: The economic role of women in Roman Egypt was indeed genuine, as far as it went, but it derived quite directly from the female right to share in the property of her own family by dowry and inheritance, and probably did not extend much beyond that.
